title: Have to be in the mood.
review: If you're looking for an exciting space movie like Armageddon, this isn't it. I was excited about this one, but ended up falling asleep several times before turning it off. I'll give it another shot in the future, but it seemed very dull.

title: Had me crying.
review: I'll never forget the day I was this film in theaters. I couldn't even see straight because I was laughing so hard I was crying nonstop.
